CompetitionExecution

Class Avoidance

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • CompetitionExecution.Avoidance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class Avoidance
extends java.lang.Thread
    This class will run as a thread when robot has detected an obstacle in the front, and the thread should be given top priority to ensure robot must run through this thread first. The thread is transient, and will die out itself when avoidance is done
    Author:
    joey
